theorems.name: Theorem Similarity Triangles Side Angle Side
theorems.description: If two sides of one triangle are proportional to two sides of another triangle and the angles enclosed between these sides are equal, then such triangles are similar.

algorithm: let shifted = triangle1.shifted(by: Shift(i, reversed: reversed))
result.append(BEPolygonSimilarity(left: triangle1, right: triangle2, leftShift: Shift(i, reversed = reversed)))
